briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of GTR in Comparison to Copaxone®

outcomeMeasures.title: The Number of T1-Gadolinium Enhancing Lesions During Months 7-9
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary endpoint was the total number of gadolinium enhancing lesions (i.e., the cumulative number of new and persisting gadolinium enhancing lesions) during months 7 through 9.
